entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
